sections.text: organizations; purpose.The purpose of sections 2-2801 to 2-2812 is to provide for the organization, procedure, and financial support of associations or societies of Nebraska citizens who seek (1) to improve segments of the agricultural industry, homes, and communities of the state, and (2) to cooperate with and to supplement and complement the programs of the University of Nebraska Institute of Agriculture and Natural Resources and other state or local organizations.SourceLaws 1969, c. 2, ยง 1, p. 62.

2-2801.Agricultural organizations; purpose.

The purpose of sections 2-2801 to 2-2812 is to provide for the organization, procedure, and financial support of associations or societies of Nebraska citizens who seek (1) to improve segments of the agricultural industry, homes, and communities of the state, and (2) to cooperate with and to supplement and complement the programs of the University of Nebraska Institute of Agriculture and Natural Resources and other state or local organizations.

SourceLaws 1969, c. 2, ยง 1, p. 62.
